onPageSEO.titleTagTemplate: [Category] Online in Bangalore | [USP] | Whole Lot of Nature
onPageSEO.imageAltText: Include plant name, product type, and benefit in alt text
onPageSEO.internalLinking: Link related categories, blog posts, and care guides

technicalSEO.mobileOptimization: Ensure responsive design for mobile shopping
technicalSEO.pageSpeed: Optimize images, enable lazy loading, use CDN
technicalSEO.structuredData: Implement Product schema, Organization schema, LocalBusiness schema
technicalSEO.xmlSitemap: Include all product and category pages
technicalSEO.robots.txt: Allow indexing of product categories and blog pages

contentStrategy.productPageOptimization: Unique descriptions, user reviews, related products
contentStrategy.userGeneratedContent: Customer testimonials, plant journey stories, photo galleries
contentStrategy.keywordPlacement: H1 (once per page), H2/H3 (naturally), first 100 words

localSEO.googleMyBusiness: Claim and optimize GMB listing with Bangalore location
localSEO.locationPages: Consider separate pages for different Bangalore zones
localSEO.localBacklinks: Partner with local garden clubs, nurseries, events
localSEO.reviews: Encourage customer reviews on Google, Trustpilot, industry sites

linkBuildingStrategy.internalLinks: Link product pages to related blog content
linkBuildingStrategy.externalLinks: Guest posts on gardening blogs, partnerships
linkBuildingStrategy.brokenLinkBuilding: Find broken links on gardening resource sites

seasonalOptimization.monsoonSeason: Focus on monsoon gardening guides and monsoon plants
seasonalOptimization.summerSeason: Heat-resistant plants, watering guides, summer care
seasonalOptimization.festivalSeason: Diwali plant gifts, Baisakhi garden celebrations
